name: Mini Golf Worlds VR
description:
Features:

  • 8 Player multiplayer
  • Proximity based voice chat
  • Realistic golf club physics with fixed size that allows for a variety of trick shots

  • Automatic transition from one hole to the next

  • In-depth appearance customization

  • 8 Different ball trail variants

  • Real time reflections and shadows
Three unique worlds are available at launch, with additional levels in development that will release as free content
